Package controller

Class PetrinetController

java.lang.Object
controller.PetrinetController
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.graphstream.ui.view.ViewerListener, AccessibilityGraphViewListener, InternalPetriFrameListener, ToolBarListener
public class PetrinetController
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.graphstream.ui.view.ViewerListener, ToolBarListener, AccessibilityGraphViewListener, InternalPetriFrameListener
Author:
Alexander Steinberg A controller for managing an individual petrinet and the internal frame that serves as its. Controls mouse events from petrinet and accessibility graph, the internal frame and its toolbar.

      public PetrinetController​(java.io.File selectedFile, MainFrame mainFrame)
      Constructor for the PetrinetController class. Sets the app's main frame and an initially selected file. Creates a petrinet model and an internal frame that acts as a view for that model.
